description: User provides an internal briefing for a new AI analytics platform launch. PressMate AI extracts the details, fetches the corporate style guide, generates SEO keywords, drafts, proofreads, and formats a plain‑text press release with a 70‑character line limit for email distribution.

messages.content: You are PressMate AI, an agentic LLM that assists PR teams. You have access to the following tools: extract_brief, fetch_style_guide, get_seo_keywords, draft_release, proofread_release, format_release, distribution_list_generator, schedule_publication. Follow the user’s instructions and use the tools as needed to produce brand‑compliant, SEO‑optimized press releases.

Here is our internal briefing for the upcoming launch of our new AI‑powered analytics platform, scheduled for 15 May 2025 in San Francisco. Please produce a plain‑text press release suitable for email distribution, making sure no line exceeds 70 characters. Include a short media‑contact line at the end.

---
Title: "InsightX AI Launch"
Date: May 15, 2025
Location: San Francisco, CA
Company: DataPulse Inc.
Summary: DataPulse is unveiling InsightX, an AI‑driven analytics platform that offers real‑time predictive insights for enterprise customers.
Key Features:
- Real‑time data processing
- Predictive modeling powered by proprietary deep‑learning algorithms
- Seamless integration with existing BI tools
Quote from CEO Jane Doe: "InsightX will empower businesses to make smarter, faster decisions backed by AI."
---
Extracting the core event details from the briefing.

event_details.title: InsightX AI Launch

Seamless integration with existing BI tools

style_guide.signature:
###
Media Contact:
Name: Alex Rivera
Title: PR Manager
Phone: +1‑555‑123‑4567
Email: pr@datapulse.com

messages.content:
INSIGHTX AI LAUNCH

San Francisco, CA – May 15, 2025 – DataPulse Inc. today announces the launch of InsightX, an AI‑driven analytics platform designed to deliver real‑time predictive insights for enterprise customers. InsightX combines real‑time data processing, proprietary deep‑learning predictive modeling, and seamless integration with existing BI tools, enabling businesses to make smarter, faster decisions.

"InsightX will empower businesses to make smarter, faster decisions backed by AI," said Jane Doe, Chief Executive Officer of DataPulse.

Key features of InsightX include:
- Real‑time data processing
- Predictive modeling powered by proprietary deep‑learning algorithms
- Seamless integration with existing BI tools

For more information, visit https://datapulse.com/insightx.

###
Media Contact:
Name: Alex Rivera
Title: PR Manager
Phone: +1‑555‑123‑4567
Email: pr@datapulse.com
Proofreading the drafted release for grammar, spelling, brand tone, and readability.

arguments.draft_text:
INSIGHTX AI LAUNCH

San Francisco, CA – May 15, 2025 – DataPulse Inc. today announces the launch of InsightX, an AI‑driven analytics platform designed to deliver real‑time predictive insights for enterprise customers. InsightX combines real‑time data processing, proprietary deep‑learning predictive modeling, and seamless integration with existing BI tools, enabling businesses to make smarter, faster decisions.

"InsightX will empower businesses to make smarter, faster decisions backed by AI," said Jane Doe, Chief Executive Officer of DataPulse.

Key features of InsightX include:
- Real‑time data processing
- Predictive modeling powered by proprietary deep‑learning algorithms
- Seamless integration with existing BI tools

For more information, visit https://datapulse.com/insightx.

Title: PR Manager

Email: pr@datapulse.com
